Uses of Package
org.apache.avalon.composition.provider

Packages that use org.apache.avalon.composition.provider
org.apache.avalon.activation.impl Default runtime platform.  
org.apache.avalon.composition.model.impl The model package contains a series of classes that leverage the new meta data model.  
org.apache.avalon.composition.provider The runtime package contains interfaces used by a runtime layer.  
 

Classes in org.apache.avalon.composition.provider used by org.apache.avalon.activation.impl
LifestyleFactory
          A factory enabling the establishment of runtime handlers.
LifestyleManager
          A lifestyle handler provides support for a particular lifestyle policy.
Runtime
          Defintion of runtime services.
SystemContext
          Defintion of a system context that exposes a system wide set of parameters.
